name: Hrimnir the Divine Follower
effectText: You can Tribute 3 Fairy monsters from your hand and/or field; Set 1 Continuous Spell from your Deck, but send it to the GY during your opponent's End Phase. If this card is sent to the GY by card effect: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Hrimnir the Divine Follower" once per turn.
